attributes.action: sort out the backlog of computers being checked in police investigation
attributes.additional_details: The backlog of computers waiting to be checked by the police  intelligence  unitis causing people who may be innocent to be stuck on bail for months or years and causes the police unnecessary work re bailing people who could have been cleared months who. The triage system means the innocent are left hanging whilst the guilty get seen too first. The back log seems to be an excuse and nothing is being done about it. Surely it is in everybody's best interest to get this sorted
